content:
I'm glad you liked the ideas. I think it's a great idea to incorporate volleyball-themed challenges to make the game night more engaging and relevant to your team's interests. The "spike" competition sounds like a lot of fun! Just make sure to have a safe and controlled environment for the challenges to avoid any injuries. 

By the way, have you thought about how you're going to keep track of scores and points throughout the game night? You might want to consider having a scoreboard or a designated scorekeeper to keep everything organized and transparent. 

Also, are you planning on serving any snacks or drinks during the game night? You could have some volleyball-themed snacks, like "spike" energy bars or "volleyball" cupcakes, to add to the festive atmosphere.
